Indian Economy.title: TACO debate: Trump’s tariff disruptions seem unlikely to damage the US economy this year

Indian Economy.title: Gender injustice: We need to break free of patriarchal clutches
Indian Economy.summary: Last week’s murder of tennis coach Radhika Yadav made us sit up. It should also make us confront the prejudices that hold not just Indian women back from success, but the country as a whole. Male domination of society weakens our economic prospects.

Indian Economy.title: Indonesia to Continue Talks on Jets, Minerals After Tariffs Deal
Indian Economy.summary: Indonesia will keep talking with the US on sectoral tariffs, jet purchases and critical minerals after securing a 19% baseline tariff rate on exports to the world’s largest economy, a government adviser said Thursday.

Indian Economy.title: India's CAD to face upward risk amid rising commodity prices: UBI Report
Indian Economy.summary: Union Bank of India report predicts marginal rise in India's current account deficit in FY26 due to global factors.

Startups & Funding.title: Meat delivery startup FreshToHome eyes up to $50 million to expand Middle East business
Startups & Funding.summary: Online fish and meat startup FreshToHome is raising fresh capital to strengthen its Middle East play, two years after Amazon-backed round. Revenues surged 15x in FY24 even as losses halved.

Startups & Funding.title: Chiratae-backed Uniphore Technologies in talks to raise up to $250 million
Startups & Funding.summary: The conversational AI startup is seeking fresh capital to fuel global expansion and deepen its AI bets.

Startups & Funding.title: W Health Ventures set to close $100–150 mn fund II for early-stage healthcare bets in India and US
Startups & Funding.summary: W Health is also witnessing a leadership churn. Namit Chugh, a principal at the firm, has resigned from the post and is currently serving his notice

Startups & Funding.title: India has seen an explosion of fertility startups. Next up: deal spree
Startups & Funding.summary: At least 37 fertility ventures were founded between 2021 and 2025 as rising incomes make assisted reproduction services accessible to more Indians. Here's what these startups offer and who is chasing them…

Startups & Funding.title: IPO-bound udaan acquires retail-tech startup ShopKirana
Startups & Funding.summary: The acquisition also reinforces udaan's strategy of driving profitable growth through deeper market penetration, operational efficiency, and broader geographic reach

Banking & Finance.title: Banks seek to park surplus liquidity amounting to Rs 2.07 lakh crore at the 7-day VRRR auction
Banking & Finance.summary: RBI conducts VRRR auction to manage surplus liquidity in banking system, accepting offers worth ₹ 2,00,027 crore at 5.49 per cent

Banking & Finance.title: ₹27,000 crore worth government securities fully subscribed on Friday
Banking & Finance.summary: Government securities auctioned by RBI, states raise funds through securities with varying yields and tenures.

Banking & Finance.title: Relief for borrowers as RBI’s guidelines on loan prepayment to come into force from January 1
Banking & Finance.summary: RBI early this month released a set of guidelines on pre-payment charges on loans which will be applicable to all commercial banks (excluding payments banks), cooperative banks and NBFCs. These will come into force from January 1 next year

Banking & Finance.title: Axis Bank elevates Neeraj Gambhir as executive director
Banking & Finance.summary: Private sector Axis Bank on Friday announced the appointment of Neeraj Gambhir as a whole-time director, designated as executive director of the bank.

Banking & Finance.title: The phenomenal rise in unclaimed deposits
Banking & Finance.summary: Despite RBI’s measures, unclaimed money in bank accounts has zoomed from ₹2,795 crore in 2014, to ₹97,545 crore in 2025

Technology Sector.title: Apple reseller Ample to grow revenue by a third as it expands presence, portfolio, CEO says

Technology Sector.title: Mint Explainer: Will FY26 be a washout year for the IT services industry?
Technology Sector.summary: The latest earnings reports reveal a turbulent time for IT services, with companies grappling with tariff impacts and shifting client demands. What lies ahead for the industry in FY26?

Technology Sector.title: Humour can’t save the world but deserves a chance anyway
Technology Sector.summary: It’s not an indulgence. It keeps us human in a world that can feel transactional, helps us cope with stress and offers perspective. But where has all the humour vanished? Don’t let it go missing in action.
